casebody.data:
No. 10-7315. Austin Cooper, Petitioner v. Ray Hobbs, Director, Arkansas Department of Correction. 562 U.S. 1115, 131 S. Ct. 836, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9667,

178 L. Ed. 2d 568,

December 13, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 365 Fed. Appx. 740.
